question: Two fly wheels are connected by a non-slipping belt as shown in the figure. <katex>$I_1=4 kg m^2, r_1=20cm$</katex>, <katex>$I_2=20 kg m^2, r_2=30cm$</katex>. A torque of 10 Nm is applied on the smaller wheel. Then match the entries of column I with appropriate entries of column II.
images/a1b2c3d4-0006-4000-8000-000000000006.png

| Column I | Column II |
|---|---|
| (a) Angular acceleration of smaller wheel | (i) 5/3 |
| (b) Torque on the larger wheel | (ii) 100/3 |
| (c) Angular acceleration of larger wheel | (iii) 5/2 |
explanation: Torque on larger wheel: <katex>$\tau_2 = I_2 \alpha_2 = 20 \times (5/3) = 100/3$</katex> (matches ii).
